trans-unit.source: DSC Archive Resource
trans-unit.target: DSC Archive Resource

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: The Archive resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: The Archive resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.zip) files at a specific path.

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: Syntax

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Destination
trans-unit.target: Destination

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location where you want to ensure the archive contents are extracted.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the location where you want to ensure the archive contents are extracted.

trans-unit.source: Path
trans-unit.target: Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the source path of the archive file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the source path of the archive file.

trans-unit.source: Checksum
trans-unit.target: Checksum

trans-unit.source: Defines the type to use when determining whether two files are the same.
trans-unit.target: Defines the type to use when determining whether two files are the same.

trans-unit.source: If Checksum is not specified, only the file or directory name is used for comparison.
trans-unit.target: If Checksum is not specified, only the file or directory name is used for comparison.

trans-unit.source: Valid values include: SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, createdDate, modifiedDate, none (default).
trans-unit.target: Valid values include: SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, createdDate, modifiedDate, none (default).

trans-unit.source: If you specify Checksum without Validate, the configuration will fail.
trans-unit.target: If you specify Checksum without Validate, the configuration will fail.

trans-unit.source: Ensure
trans-unit.target: Ensure

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to check if the content of the archive exists at the Destination.
trans-unit.target: Determines whether to check if the content of the archive exists at the Destination.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to Present to ensure the contents exist.
trans-unit.target: Set this property to Present to ensure the contents exist.

trans-unit.source: Set it to Absent to ensure they do not exist.
trans-unit.target: Set it to Absent to ensure they do not exist.

trans-unit.source: The default value is Present.
trans-unit.target: The default value is Present.

trans-unit.source: DependsOn
trans-unit.target: DependsOn

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is ResourceName and its type is ResourceType, the syntax for using this property is DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName".
trans-unit.target: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is ResourceName and its type is ResourceType, the syntax for using this property is DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName".

trans-unit.source: Validate
trans-unit.target: Validate

trans-unit.source: Uses the Checksum property to determine if the archive matches the signature.
trans-unit.target: Uses the Checksum property to determine if the archive matches the signature.

trans-unit.source: If you specify Checksum without Validate, the configuration will fail.
trans-unit.target: If you specify Checksum without Validate, the configuration will fail.

trans-unit.source: If you specify Validate without Checksum, a SHA-256 checksum is used by default.
trans-unit.target: If you specify Validate without Checksum, a SHA-256 checksum is used by default.

trans-unit.source: Force
trans-unit.target: Force

trans-unit.source: Certain file operations (such as overwriting a file or deleting a directory that is not empty) will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: Certain file operations (such as overwriting a file or deleting a directory that is not empty) will result in an error.

trans-unit.source: Using the Force property overrides such errors.
trans-unit.target: Using the Force property overrides such errors.

trans-unit.source: The default value is False.
trans-unit.target: The default value is False.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the Archive resource to ensure that the contents of an archive file called Test.zip exist and are extracted at a given destination.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows how to use the Archive resource to ensure that the contents of an archive file called Test.zip exist and are extracted at a given destination.
